title: All the eligible occupants shall be rehabilitated in the redeveloped buildings of URC as far as possible
clause_text: All the eligible occupants shall be rehabilitated in the redeveloped buildings of URC as far as possible. However at the request of or with the consent of an occupant, he may be allotted alternative rehabilitation in a location outside URC, up to the extent of his eligibility, at the discretion of the Municipal Commissioner. Request or consent under this provision shall however be irrevocable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
